btk.survey module¶

The survey module defines the Survey class as a namedtuple, which contains the information relevant to observing conditions for a given survey. A Survey contains several instances of Filter, which are also namedtuples containing information specific to each filter.

Contains information for surveys available in BTK.

btk.survey.get_flux(ab_magnitude, filt, survey)¶

Convert source magnitude to flux. The calculation includes the effects of atmospheric extinction. Credit: WeakLensingDeblending (https://github.com/LSSTDESC/WeakLensingDeblending)

Parameters

ab_magnitude (float) – AB magnitude of source.

Returns

Flux in detected electrons.

Return type

float

btk.survey.get_mean_sky_level(survey, filt)¶
btk.survey.get_psf(survey, filt, atmospheric_model='Kolmogorov')¶

Credit: WeakLensingDeblending (https://github.com/LSSTDESC/WeakLensingDeblending)

btk.survey.make_wcs(pixel_scale, shape, center_pix=None, center_sky=None, projection='TAN')¶

Creates WCS for an image. :param pixel_scale: pixel size in arcseconds :type pixel_scale: float :param shape: shape of the image in pixels. :type shape: tuple :param center_pix: tuple representing the center of the image in pixels :param center_sky: tuple representing the center of the image in sky coordinates

(RA,DEC) in arcseconds.

Parameters

projection (str) – projection type, default to TAN. A list of available types can be found in astropy.wcs documentation

Returns

WCS

Return type

wcs
